di.unipi.ase.doodleservice

Class Doodle

  • Object
    • di.unipi.ase.doodleservice.Doodle

  • public class Doodle
extends Object
    Doodle class (given by the professor): in addition some exceptions have been handled and the comments have been added to the code.

        public String addVote(Vote vote)
        Add the vote of the voter for the chosen option in the doodle.
        Parameters:
        vote - the vote
        Returns:
        the name of the voter if the vote is valid, null otherwise
        Throws:

      • findPreviousVote

        public String findPreviousVote(String name)
        Check the option of the doodle voted by the user, if any.
        Parameters:
        name - the voter
        Returns:
        null if the voter has never voted, the option he voted otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the name is a null parameter

      • removeVote

        public boolean removeVote(String name)
        Remove the vote of the given voter, if any.
        Parameters:
        name - the voter
        Returns:
        true if the voter has already voted, false, otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the name is a null parameter
